Description:
    Use the dateTime type of the User Properties will cause an error

Step to reproduce:
    1. Insert a label 
    2. Add an User Properties in the Properties Editor
    3. Choose the dateTime type and input a name
    4. Chose the label and go to the "Properties" view
    5. Find the user property you added just now and click the "..." button

Actual result?F
    
Throw an exception :
